CustomField.description: When updating this formula, please update the logic related to FinanceSegmentStamp field in "OpportunityHelper" class
CustomField.formula: IF( CloseDate <= DATEVALUE("2021-08-06") && Finance_Segment_Stamp__c!=null, Finance_Segment_Stamp__c , IF( CloseDate <= DATEVALUE("2021-08-06") && Finance_Segment_Stamp__c==null, Owner_Segment__c , IF( OR( CONTAINS(Bookings_Owner_Segment__c, "Small Business"), CONTAINS(Bookings_Owner_Segment__c, "AE1") ), "SMB", if( CONTAINS(Bookings_Owner_Segment__c, "Enterprise"), "Enterprise", "Mid Market" ))))
CustomField.label: Finance Segment
